mapper.select: SELECT orders.order_number FROM tt_client_tracking client, oms_bt_orders omsOrders, tt_orders orders WHERE client.order_channel_id = #{order_channel_id} AND client.sim_flg = '0' AND client.order_channel_id = omsOrders.order_channel_id AND client.client_order_id = omsOrders.client_order_id AND omsOrders.order_channel_id = orders.order_channel_id AND omsOrders.order_number = orders.order_number AND (client.tracking_type = '' OR client.tracking_no = '')

SELECT client.*, orders.order_number, orders.syn_ship_no, '0' as reservation_id FROM tt_client_tracking client, oms_bt_orders omsOrders, tt_orders orders WHERE client.order_channel_id = #{order_channel_id} AND client.sim_flg = '0' AND client.order_channel_id = omsOrders.order_channel_id AND client.client_order_id = omsOrders.client_order_id AND omsOrders.order_channel_id = orders.order_channel_id AND omsOrders.order_number = orders.order_number AND client.tracking_type != '' AND client.tracking_no != '' order by client.tracking_no asc, client.tracking_time desc LIMIT #{limit};

SELECT orders.order_number FROM tt_client_tracking client, oms_bt_orders omsOrders, tt_orders orders WHERE client.order_channel_id = #{order_channel_id} AND client.sim_flg = '0' AND client.order_channel_id = omsOrders.order_channel_id AND client.client_order_id = omsOrders.order_number AND omsOrders.order_channel_id = orders.order_channel_id AND omsOrders.order_number = orders.order_number AND (client.tracking_type = '' OR client.tracking_no = '')
